Ordered this for my best friend who is expecting her little bean (her nickname for her daughter!) next month. The onesie is a cotton tshirt material, the letters are some kind of iron on vinyl so not my favorite quality but for a sentimental baby item it absolutely gets the job done!
I got this hoping my newborn would be able to wear it home as her first day outfit but it’ll fit her till she’s 6 months 😂
Great gift or just to spoil your little one!
adorable

I was so excited when I saw this because I always call my little one little bean. This is 3-6mo and she is 4mo right now and it fits well. I didn’t realized it was meant to be an oversized sweatshirt but I love it all the more for it! She’s so cute in it and it’s winter so it’s perfect timing for the cozy sweaters!

This is the first onesie I bought when I found out I was pregnant! It’s super cute and can’t wait to have him wear it

This onesie is adorable and I know it will look so cute on my friend's baby! The fabric does seem a little bit cheap - it is a somewhat glossy texture, but still seems comfortable.  The print is nicely done and the design means it will probably fit for a while! May run just slightly large.
